title: Astronomical Units Conversion
description: This function block performs conversions between different astronomical distance units including meters, astronomical units (AE), parsecs (PC), and light years (LJ). It takes input parameters related to these distances and calculates their corresponding values in meters as output.
name: ASTRO

input.name: AE
input.description: Distance in astronomical units, where 1 AE = 149,597,870 meters.

input.name: PC
input.description: Distance in parsecs, where 1 parsec = 206265 AE.

input.name: LJ
input.description: Distance in light years, where 1 light year = 63240 AE.

output.name: Ym
output.description: Converted distance in meters based on input parameters.
